title: How to Win on the Valhalla Map in Halo 3

steps.headline: Learn the locations of all the guns.
steps.description: For example, the shotgun is located in the cave on the snowy side of the map, and the sniper rifle is beside the inner ramp on both bases.

steps.headline: Look for convenient spots.
steps.description: Look across from the turret, towards the metal wall. You can jump in the little pile of rocks and it's a great sniping spot. Places like these are often overlooked.

steps.headline: Get used to the vehicles.
steps.description: A Wraith, Banshee, Warthog and two Mongooses are present in each base.

steps.headline: Learn the missile pod.
steps.description: There is one present in each base and can lock onto vehicles.

steps.headline: Utilise the scenery items already placed in the maps to your advantage.
steps.description: For example, if someone is hiding behind the wall next to the man cannon in a base and jumping up and down while you're trying to snipe them to taunt you, snipe the Fusion Coil while they're in the air to create a big explosion.

steps.headline: Learn to use and attack vehicles.
steps.description: For example, practice hijacking a Banshee, and know that running towards a Wraith head-on isn't a very good strategy.

steps.headline: Create a strategy that others won't foresee.
steps.description: For example, driving around in a Mongoose for apparently no reason will put people off their guard, when you're actually going to the other base to get the sniper.

steps.headline: Practice.
steps.description: You knew this was coming. But really, you can only really get good at this map once you play it again and again.
